src_original: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti //
evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatropapatsyante tatra
tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś ca arcitāś ca apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣūpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargopapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
